about_the_game:
Forbidden Ninja Scroll is a Kunoichi (Female Ninja) adventure & simulation game compatible in VR and non-VR.

Users play as Hachiro - the son of the leader of the Iizuna school of Ninja, and candidate to become the next master. One day, Hachiro meets Kunoichi deep in the mountains, where he undergoes trials to become the Tengu - the head of the Kunoichi harem.

=========================================
You can now Try Out Public Prototype Demo!
=========================================

The game will have two parts:

・Story-driven adventure
・Simulation-based ‘mini-games’ where a player will interact with Kunoichi in VR.

Core Features:
・Heart-warming and compelling Ninja storyline with Kunoichi (Female Ninjas), released in episodic order.
・"Real time" interactive, sexy game-play in both VR and non-VR* (*planned as a stretch goal)
・Beautiful art by a popular adult artist, Rororogi Mogera
・Songs and music by DJ SHARPNEL feat. Natsu Aikawa, featuring Japanese-style rock and heavy rave speed.
・A comical scenario with a multiple endings (based on the player's decision) by Saburo Miura.
・Voluminous 3D model by Kakomiki.
・ASMR, binaural voice contents that makes you feel you are surrounded by the characters
・More to be announced! Please check our 'goals'.


Team:
Developer : ImagineVR x Portalgraph
Character Design : Rororogi Mogera ( 露々々木もげら)
Scenario : Saburo Miura ( みうらさぶろう)
Music : DJ SHARPNEL feat. Natsu Aikawa (相川なつ)
3D Model : Kakomiki ( かこみき)

About Dev:
ImagineVR is a virtual reality game publisher working with indie game developers to co-develop bold and innovative entertainment applications. ImagineVR and Portalgraph (Formerly VRJCC) have been working together for a long time, initially as a partnership in publishing “Let’s Play with Nanai!”, an interactive VR sex simulator which received a lot of attention in Japan and at overseas conventions such as Anime Expo. (You might be familiar with the scenes from our booth at Anime Expo 2018)

content_descriptors.notes: This product contains nudity and adult-oriented sexual encounters
